++ Object Data Computer File Operations

* Create

* ChangeAttributes 

* Open
  * open an existing file  
    * makes the file contents available to the program
* Read
  * Read data out of the file 
* Write
  * Write data into the file 
* Delete
* Close
  * terminating the association between it and the program
* Truncate 
  * shorten file to a specified size within the file system 
    * without rewriting any content
